mapper.update:
update t_customer_basic_info
customerNo = #{customerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cnSurname = #{cnsurname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cnGivenname = #{cngivenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enFirstName = #{enfirstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enMiddleName = #{enmiddlename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enLastName = #{enlastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idCardNo = #{idcardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passportNo = #{passportno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
headPic = #{headpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
marriage = #{marriage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
occupation = #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleteFlg = #{deleteflg,jdbcType=CHAR},
addTimestamp = #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
addUserKey = #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updTimestamp = #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updUserKey = #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updPgmId = #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where no = #{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_customer_basic_info set customerNo = #{customerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cnSurname = #{cnsurname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cnGivenname = #{cngivenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enFirstName = #{enfirstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enMiddleName = #{enmiddlename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enLastName = #{enlastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idCardNo = #{idcardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passportNo = #{passportno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headPic = #{headpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marriage = #{marriage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, occupation = #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleteFlg = #{deleteflg,jdbcType=CHAR}, addTimestamp = #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, addUserKey = #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updTimestamp = #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updUserKey = #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updPgmId = #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where no = #{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select A.customerNo, C.telNo, A.cnSurname, A.cnGivenname, A.enFirstName, A.enMiddleName, A.enLastName, A.idCardNo, A.passportNo, A.sex, A.nickName, A.birthday, A.marriage, A.education, A.occupation, A.deleteFlg, B.canLogin, D.points as point, D.level from t_customer_basic_info A inner join t_customer_login_info B on A.customerNo = B.customerNo inner join t_customer_security_info C on A.customerNo = C.customerNo left join t_customer_member_info D on A.customerNo = D.customerNo
SELECT count(1) FROM t_customer_basic_info A inner join t_customer_login_info B on A.customerNo = B.customerNo

select A.no as basicNo, A.customerNo, C.telNo, A.cnSurname, A.cnGivenname, A.enFirstName, A.enMiddleName, A.enLastName, A.idCardNo, A.passportNo, A.sex, A.nickName, A.birthday, A.marriage, A.education, A.occupation, A.comments, A.deleteFlg, B.canLogin from t_customer_basic_info A inner join t_customer_login_info B on A.customerNo = B.customerNo inner join t_customer_security_info C on A.customerNo = C.customerNo where A.customerNo = #{customerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
